2927:0: Buddhakapālatantra 9 caryāpaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi caryāpaṭalaṃ sudurlabham|
2927:1: yena yogī kurute sarva caryā atyantavarāṅganā||
2927:4: yad yat sattvāḥ siddhyarthino tāṃ tāṃ dāpayet sadā||
2927:6: kare kapālaṃ gṛhītvā caryā bhramate vratī|
2927:7: nagno muktaśikho bhūtvā yatra tatra yadā tadā|
2927:11: bhikṣām aṭate prājñaḥ gṛhe gṛhe niḥsaṃśayaḥ|
2927:16: na iti śūnyatābhāvaṃ dadāti it bhāvanām||
2927:18: jā ity anuttaram yānaṃ mahāmudrā sa kathyate|
2927:21: paścād bhakṣayed dravyaṃ kapāle tu vyavasthitam|
2927:30: (2) tathā coktaṃ tantre- jathā pi tatha pi jaha pi taha pi jena tena hua buddha|
2927:31: saiṃ vi-appe ṇāsi-ā sa-ala sahāve śuddha||
2927:33: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare caryāpaṭalo navamaḥ||
2927:38: muktikā śuktikā caiva rājapaṭa pravālasya ca|
2927:42: na ta auṣadha bāhyam ity uktam- na cāpi cchalla pallavaḥ sa ca|
2927:46: na cāpi aparalohasyāpi siddham auṣadham uttamam||
2927:52: ke te auṣadhi divyā siddhiś ca kīdṛśī bhavet|
2927:53: kathāyāhi tvaṃ mahādevī śrotum icchāmi ādarāt||
2927:61: kena dravyaṃ bahavo yānti vandhyā sutavatī bhavet|
2927:62: mṛtavān saṃjīvate na mriyate punaḥ punaḥ||
2927:66: sa ca sidhyante subhājanaṃ divyaṃ na jānanti bāla mohitāḥ||
2927:69: kathaṃ sattvārtha sādhyante hā hā kaṣṭaikatatparam||
2927:73: nāḍi madhye rasanī nāma tiṣṭhanti divyamahauṣadhī||
2927:75: lohaṃ yena hematāṃ yānty ekenāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhyati|
2927:87: tathāgatān sevayantī nityaṃ suguptā nirghṛṇaḥ sa ca||
2927:91: śīghradrutir bhaved yasya sa na sidhyati||
2927:97: tathā coktam- dhairyaṃ hi parama nāyakapadam|
2927:99: ata eva hi vīracetasā kāryaṃ subhājane pracodayet||
2927:104: tatra hrīṃkārabījaṃ sarvadravyaika pūrvaṃ merurājena bhūṣitam||
2927:112: paścāt karma samārabhet prājño vīrayogena cetasā|
2927:115: subhājane viśramate tatra cyutiyogāt kharaṇam eva ca|
2927:116: śīghraṃ divyaṃ samāgṛhya guḍā lepayed budhaḥ||
2927:120: (8) paścād rakṣate prājñaḥ hemo bhavati niḥsaṃśayaḥ||
2927:131: ayam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ karoti prājñaḥ śrutavanto mahāmatiḥ|
2927:132: te sarve narakaṃ yānti yāvad buddhair na hīyate||
2927:144: jīvate kalpokoṭiṃ naraḥ yāvad buddhajñānam eva ca||
2927:150: pañcavarṇarajaḥ kṛtya atha vā śuklam eva ca|
2927:158: sā strī yā vandhyā tasyā eva|
2927:165: caturbhujam ekavaktraṃ ca evam uccāraṇan viduḥ|
2927:177: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare divyamahauṣadhivandhyāsnānavidhipaṭalo daśamaḥ||
2927:183: pūrvoktacihnabhujādyaiḥ paraṃ hi varṇa śuklam eva ca|
2927:184: digyoginī bhavet śuklaṃ vidig raktam eva ca||
2927:196: daṣṭaka bhūtale na kiṃcij jīvāpayituṃ śakyate|
2927:207: tasya hṛdaye likhen mantraṃ yatra tatra patre tathā|
2927:208: mahātailena kṛtvā masīṃ mantraṃ likhed viduḥ||
2927:220: evaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kṛtvā patra hṛdaya sthāpayet|
2927:224: ghaṭ ghaṭ ghaḍa ghaḍa hrīḥ hrīḥ haḥ haḥ he he haṃ haḥ||
2927:228: ekasmin khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ bhūtvā patati daṣṭakotthati nātra saṃśayaḥ||
2927:232: pañcadaśa pustake na likhitaṃ gamyate guruprasādataḥ||
2927:237: (15) 12 nānāmantraprayogapaṭala atha vajrapāṇiś citrasenā yoginī muhur muhuḥ praṇipatyaivam uvāca- ||
2927:240: uktaṃ tvayā yat prayogaṃ trailokyeṣv api durlabham||
2927:242: dṛṣṭā mayā sarvatantrāṇi ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ|
2927:243: iha tantre tvayā yad uktaṃ sarvabuddhair na bhāṣitāḥ||
2927:246: aho hī sarvabuddhasaṃjananī aho hī mahāmudrātatpari||
2927:248: bhāṣasva devi sarvamantrāṇāṃ ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ|
2927:249: (16) yogino yena citraṃ kurvanti nānāścaryam eva ca|
2927:250: prathamapaṭale yad yad uktaṃ devi tatproyogaṃ kathayāhi me||
2927:252: īdṛg vacanaṃ śrutvā citrasenā tu yoginī|
2927:256: mārāḥ sarve prapalāyanti vighnāś ca pralayaṃ gatāḥ|
2927:257: āścaryaṃ jinavaraiḥ sarvaiḥ aho hāsasya niścayaḥ||
2927:261: tasya kaṭibhāgāsthiṃ tu gṛhītvā kuṇḍa kārayet||
2927:263: tasya kāpālam anu gṛhya tenaiva śirasā varti dāpayet|
2927:268: yogī buddhakāpāladharo bhūtvā imaṃ mantram uccārayan||
2927:270: oṃ buddhakapālinī dhara 2 dhadhara 2 dharāpaya 2 śoṣaya 2 tāpaya 2 drāṃ 2 āṃ māṃ sāṃ ra vāṃ kuru 2 bho bhagavati buddhakāpālasyājñā mā laṃghaya śīghraṃ kajjala pata pata pātaya 2 oṃ 2 āḥ hūṃ sumbhaya bho bhagavati hūṃ srāṃ phaṭ||
2927:282: (18) paścād yogī mahāprājñaḥ kelimālinī pivetaṃ punaḥ||
2927:287: nagnī muktaśikhī bhūtvā hāḥhoḥmantram uccārayed viduḥ|
2927:288: kelimālinī pivāpayet tatra paścāt krīḍā samārabhet||
2927:291: kajjalaṃ tu mahādivyaṃ vāmahaste tu sthāpayet||
2927:293: paścāt śanaiḥ kāryaiḥ kurvād yogaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ|
2927:299: ekaikavaṭikāṃ aṣṭottaramantraśatenābhimantrya japet- oṃ buddhakāpālinī hrī hūṃ phaṭ||
2927:301: anena mantreṇa kajjalaṃ tu mahābāho trailokyeṣv api durlabham|
2927:309: vāmahastamalitamātreṇa tatkṣaṇād eva bhadrako sa jāyate||
2927:315: vāmahaste malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ||
2927:325: pratimāṃ tu liṅgaparvatavṛkṣaṃ tu anyāni yāni tāni ca|
2927:329: punar vāmena malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ|
2927:333: tridaśeṣu bhramet prājñaḥ yad yad vastum icchati|
2927:343: tathā makṣikāś ca tathā hasti gardabham eva ca||
2927:381: (22) oṃ buddhakāpālinī dhara 2 hā he ho haṃ haḥ|
2927:384: oṃ buddhakāpālinī rama 2 krīḍa 2 haṃ haḥ|
2927:385: mahiṣāsthikena ratikrīḍā dvādaśavarṣā sa rātrau dine naro cit- taṃ na patati||
2927:387: oṃ buddhakāpālinī taṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 maṭ sphaṭ sphoṭaya utpāṭaya hūṃ phaṭ|
2927:390: oṃ sukapālinī ghara 2 maṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 paṭa 2 praṭāpaya 2 truṭa sphaṭa moṭaya 2 saṃkrāmaya hrīṃ hūṃ trayāṃ phaṭ|
2927:393: oṃ buddhakāpālinī he trāsaya māraya ghuṭa ghuṭinī sarvavanaspatīnāṃ hṛdaya tāḍaya vidrāpaya rama 2 trāsaya 2 bho bhagavatī aṃ āṃ āṃ taṭ 2 hūṃ phaṭ|
2927:396: āha- citt' eka vimala darppaṇaṃ jaṃ cintijai taṃ pi pati viśvaṃ jāṇanti vi śuaṇā|
2927:399: (23) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare nānā- mantraprayogaḥ paṭalo dvādaśamaḥ||
2927:401: (24) 13 cittaviśuddhipaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi viśuddhipaṭalaṃ śuddha durlabham||
2927:403: bhaginī bhāginī jananī duhitā bhāryā-m-eva ca|
2927:404: evaṃ kāmayet prājña mahāmudrāṃ yad iṣyate||
2927:408: evaṃ kāmayed dhīmān pañcaite yoginī varām||
2927:412: bhaginī bhavet cakṣur bhāginī tu śrotram eva ca|
2927:413: jananī bhaved ghrāṇaṃ rasaṃ duhitā tu eva ca|
2927:417: nartakī bhaven mohaṃ dveṣaṃ ḍombinīṣu ca|
2927:422: cakṣuṣā dṛśyate mohaṃ śabdaṃ dveṣo'pi jāyate|
2927:423: ghrāṇena bhujyate rāgaṃ rasaṃ mānaṃ tu eva ca|
2927:424: sparśena jāyate īrṣyā cittasyāśuddham eva ca||
2927:427: siddhir na syād bhavet śuddhyā punarjanmabhavāntare||
2927:430: bhāvaḥ kīdṛśaṃ abhāvo bhāvo bhāvyaḥ kathaṃ bhavet||
2927:432: bhaginī kathaṃ rūpaṃ gaurī śyāmā kṛṣṇavarṇajām|
2927:433: īdṛśaṃ rūpa saṃyuktaṃ śuddhacitto na drakṣyati||
2927:435: bhāginī kathaṃ śrūyate śabdaḥ dhvanis trividham eva ca|
2927:438: ghrāṇaṃ trividhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā yā sā jananī suguhyakā|
2927:441: svajihvena bhuñjate dravyaṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ svāda yādṛśī|
2927:442: svādena bhuñjate yuktaṃ svādaṃ rūpasya kīdṛśī||
2927:448: bhāve na abhāvo asti abhāvam eva ca|
2927:453: dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ bhavet karuṇā maitrī āliṅganasya ca||
2927:455: ubhayamelāpakaṃ tat kṣaraṇam upekṣā rasā smṛtā mayā||
2927:458: (27) darśanāj jāyate duḥkham āliṅganāt kiṃcit tatphalam|
2927:461: evaṃ traidhātuka utpannaṃ harṣaviṣāda etat phalam|
2927:464: yat kiṃcit khāna pānaṃ ca sukhāvahabhojanaṃ tathā|
2927:465: tat sarvaṃ viṇmūtrādi prakalpayet yogavit sadā||
2927:468: malanaḥ mardanaś caiva mahāmudrā sa kathyate|
2927:472: tāṃ pūjayed yogī kāmate na ca lipyate||
2927:474: lepa īrṣyādisaṃyuktaṃ tasya doṣair na bādhyate|
2927:475: sa yogī paramaṃ tattvam bhavadoṣair na lipyate||
2927:477: yāvan na viṣaya unmuli-ai tāma budhataṇu kema|
2927:480: (28) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare cit- taviśuddhipaṭalaḥ trayodaśamaḥ||
2927:485: tathā- atha vajrapāṇiprabhṛtayo bodhisattvāḥ sumeruparamāṇura- jasamā yoginyaḥ,
2927:489: sarvabuddhānāṃ tu jananī lakṣmī ghorā mahāyaśā|
2927:495: buddhakāpāle mahātantre buddhair yeṣāṃ na prakāśitā|
2927:497: tāṃ bhāṣitā devī eka rutena prakaṭīkṛtāḥ||
2927:507: tathāgatāś ca sarvabuddhāḥ śṛṇvantu nāgāś ca sadevamānuṣāḥ||
2927:509: ayaṃ tantrarājasya pāṭhamātreṇa yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvapuṇyam anumodayantu pariṇāmayantu mahāmudrārthe niryātayantu buddhaguṇākarān||
2927:517: yad icchet siddhiṃ varāṃ divyāṃ japed buddhakāpālayogataḥ||
2927:519: oṃ hrīṃ buddha hūṃ kāpālinī āḥ||
2927:529: evaṃjāpaṃ mānayuktaṃ siddhir bhavati na saṃśayaḥ||
2927:531: hṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālinī āḥ hīḥ haiḥ hūṃ phaṭ||
2927:533: upahṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālavajriṇi hau durjaya durlakṣe hūṃ phaṭ||
2927:544: harṣitā devī dṛṣṭvā idam vacanam abravīt|
2927:551: paścāt ātmānaṃ niryātayet prājña dṛḍhabhaktena cetasā||
2927:557: tatraiva tiṣṭhanti sarvaḍākinyaḥ anye ye ca kṛpākulāḥ||
2927:559: indī yattha vilayagau naṭṭa vi appasahāva|
2927:560: so hale paramāṇandagai phuḍa pucchaha gurupā-a||
2927:562: tasmai namo yadudayena samānakālam astaṅgatāni viṣayaiḥ samam indriyāṇi|
2927:566: iti buddhakāpālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭalaś caturdaśaḥ||
2927:568: idam avocat citrasenāyoginīprabhṛtayaḥ sarvayoginyaḥ vajraprāṇiprabhṛtibodhisattvā sarve mahābodhisattva svakas- vake sthāne viharan|
